name: These Are Frogs
description:
These Are Frogs was created for the Mini Jam Frogs2

This is a local multiplayer fly-catching frenzy where you compete to see who can get the most points before the timer ends.

Due to time constraints there are currently only 2 levels.

Don't forget to press down to croak!

----------------------

Credits to Lucas Gonze/Free Music Archive for the theme song:

 https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Lucas_Gonze/Ghost_Solos/LGonze-GhostSolos-Fro...
